/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -g -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/opengl_special_funcs.dir/opengl/special_funcs.cpp.o  -o ../bin/opengl_special_funcs  ../lib/libHalide.dylib -framework OpenGL -lpthread -lz -lm
